content: my crochet spider pattern is easy to make and perfect for those spooky halloween decorations this crochet spider has 8 legs and looks like an actual spider without any of the creepy crawly **materials** ▢caron one pound - lilac ▢5mm crochet hook ▢tapestry needle ▢polyfill ▢2 sets of safety eyes different sizes **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase 2 stitches in 1 stitch decrease = decrease 1 stitch in 2 stitches
